item.title: Trapani Travel Guide (Trapani (province)/Sicily/Italy/Europe)
item.description: Discover the best places to visit, food and drink scene, where to stay, cultural customs, and transport options in Trapani, Sicily.

item.title: Cortes Island Travel Guide (Discovery Islands/Vancouver Island/British Columbia/Canada/North America)
item.description: Planning a trip to Cortes Island? This comprehensive travel guide covers where to stay, what to do, and how to get around in this beautiful island destination. Read on for a detailed itinerary, hiking and bike routes, food and drink scene, cultural attractions, safety tips, and more.

item.title: New Hazelton Travel Guide (North Coast-Nechako/Northern British Columbia/British Columbia/Canada/North America)
item.description: Explore the culturally-rich and scenic town of New Hazelton in Northern British Columbia, Canada with this comprehensive travel guide. Discover its natural attractions, hiking and biking routes, local culture and customs, food scene, and more.

item.title: Korea Travel Guide (East Asia/Asia)
item.description: Discover the best places to visit in Korea, from culturally important historical sites to natural attractions and more. This guide offers tips on hiking and biking routes, must-try local dishes, places to stay, and the best time to visit.

item.title: South Penghu Marine National Park Travel Guide (Penghu/Taiwan/East Asia/Asia)
item.description: Discover the best attractions, food, accommodations, and more in South Penghu Marine National Park with our comprehensive travel guide.

item.title: Loppi Travel Guide (Tavastia Proper/Southern Finland/Finland/Nordic countries/Europe)
item.description: Plan your trip to Loppi, Southern Finland with this helpful travel guide. Explore outdoor adventures, cultural attractions, local cuisine, and more.

item.title: Koravangala Travel Guide (Hassan (district)/Cauvery Basin/Karnataka/Southern India/India/South Asia/Asia)
item.description: Discover the best cultural and natural attractions, food and drink scene, where to stay, what to buy, safety and health, how to get around, and nearby destinations and excursions in Koravangala.

item.title: Highland Park Travel Guide (Middlesex County/Gateway/New Jersey/Mid-Atlantic/United States of America/North America)
item.description: Discover the best places to visit, dine, and stay in Highland Park. Learn about the town's cultural and natural attractions, activities, and tours, and read important travel information before your next adventure.

item.title: Lunigiana Travel Guide (Italy/Europe)
item.description: Discover the best things to do and places to visit in Lunigiana, Italy. Find out about local culture, food, transportation, and more in this comprehensive travel guide.

item.title: West Adelaide Travel Guide (Adelaide/Adelaide Region/South Australia/Australia/Oceania)
item.description: Discover the rich culture, natural beauty, and exciting activities waiting for you in West Adelaide. Learn about the must-visit attractions, where to stay, and how to get around in this comprehensive guide.
